Description: Master cloudformation template, this one use nested templates to create the whole stack

VPCCFTemplateURL.Description: URL Template to create VPC the stack
VPCCFTemplateURL.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid URL like https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/bucketname/file.json

EC2CFTemplateURL.Description: URL Template to create instances stack
EC2CFTemplateURL.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid URL like https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/bucketname/file.json

SubnetCIDR01.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.
SubnetCIDR01.Description: IP Address range for the Public Subnet 01

SubnetCIDR02.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.
SubnetCIDR02.Description: IP Address range for the Public Subnet 02

VPCCIDR.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.
VPCCIDR.Description: IP Address range for the VPC

KeyPairName.Description: Key pair to use in the instances
